arts.ttl: Fiorentina vs. Bologna: a crucial Appennine Derby
arts.sum: Stefano Pioli is the former manager of the day: he coached Bologna from October 2011 to January 2014, recording 32 wins, 28 draws and 37 defeats in 97 official matches. Vincenzo Italiano, former manager of the day: as a coach, he has 162 official appearances with Fiorentina, with a record of 77 wins, 36 draws and 49 defeats, from the 2021/22 season to 2023/24.
